name: AR Invaders Attack
description:
Defend your planet from the invaders. Enjoy this augmented reality game with such an awesome user experience.
The Earth planet is in danger! it's being attached by real ufo's conquering our planet. You're the chosen one to defeat it.
Currently the Earth is being invaded by aliens and you are humanity's last hope. You have joined Earth's Resistance Forces to hold back the aliens ships that are attacking our cities, forests and beaches - wherever you are, they are coming.

Tilt your iPhone or iPad and move yourself around and shoot them.
Touch the gun to shoot. Your entire world in your scenario.
If the aliens reach you it's all over!
